data.name: Trials® Rising - Open Beta
data.detailed_description:
Play Trials® Rising for free now during Open Beta!

Be among the first to explore over-the-top action and physics-bending motorcycle racing in the latest game in the Trials® franchise.

In the Open Beta, get behind the handlebars to experience challenging tracks all around the world. Prove your worth against your competition, create custome outfits for your rider, challenge your friends or even join forces on a tandem bike!

Open Beta Bonus: Play the Open Beta and unlock the Trials Turbo Bike at launch. See more in-game.

Pre-order Bonus: Pre-order the full game now and receive the Jungle Rider and Wild West Rider Packs.

Please note that the Beta content does not represent the progression that you will encounter in the final game and that the number of tracks is limited.

An internet connection is required.

data.short_description: Welcome to Trials® Rising Open Beta! Be among the first to explore the latest game in the Trials® franchise. Beta content is not the final content. An internet connection is required.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

data.drm_notice:
Denuvo
5 Activations per 24 hours machine activation limit
data.ext_user_account_notice: Ubisoft Account (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
